original_text:
She opens her arms to the poor
    and extends her hands to the needy.
korean_text: 그는 곤고한 자에게 손을 펴며 궁핍한 자를 위하여 손을 내밀며

sentences.original_text: She opens her arms to the poor
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 가난한 자들을 위해 팔을 연다

sentences.original_text: and extends her hands to the needy
